alert.note: Alert for Fremont County Including Canon City, Howard, Texas Creek; Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Teller County, Rampart Range Including Pikes Peak and Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 21 at 5:41PM MST until December 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning remains in effect from 10 AM Wednesday morning through 5 PM Wednesday afternoon for gusty winds and low relative humidity for fire weather zones 221, 222 and 229 which includes Teller, Fremont and Huerfano Counties... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 221...222 AND 229... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 221...222 and 229. * Winds...West 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 7 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Fremont County Including Canon City, Howard, Texas Creek; Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Teller County, Rampart Range Including Pikes Peak and Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument
